title: Kanchana Mala Lyrics Vandhaan Vendraan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Karthik, Priya Hemesh
Lyrics: Thamarai
Song: Kanchana Mala

Mayil thogai onru, Madiyil vanthu sainthukolla
Manapadam seitha, vaarathai ellam thondai killa
Nodi neram naane, ennai vittu thalli 
sella sella sella sella sella .....

Kanchana Mala, Kanchana Mala
Kollamal kollum kanenna vela
Malayaala manmele, un kaalgal nadaka
Aarelu pandhaaga, nejam kudhika
Kanchana Mala ..

Yee, en ullangilil minsarangal oduthe
Urchagam vandhu uchanthalai yerudhe
Maaligai pole veedugal katti,
Maragali naalil naan tharavaa
Ovvoru naalum ovvoru veetil
Unnai naanum thaedatta .. ohhhhh

Sanjalam konda kangalai moodi
Chandran kaana kaathiirundhen
Ne varavillai ve varavillai
Vidinje poche en seiven..

Kanchana Mala, Kanchana Mala 
Kollamal kollum kanenna vela
Kanchana Mala ....

Pogum thooram enna solla ..  vaanam vaanam
Naanum varen konjam nillu.. nethaan megam
Ne thaeda solum kadanaan.. thaedi paathu
Ne thoonga seiyum vedanaai ..

Heyy, en ullangilil minsarangal oduthe
Heyyy,Urchagam vandhu uchanthalai yerudhe

Maaligai pole veedugal katti,
Maragali naalil naan tharavaa
Ovvoru naalum ovvoru veetil
Unnai naanum thaedatta .. ohhhhh

Sanjalam konda kangalai moodi
Chandran kaana kaathiirundhen
Ne varavillai ve varavillai
Vidinje poche en seiven..

Kallum onri solli thanthai..katru kondai
Nee kaanam pole katril vanthai..kandu kondai
En aatril odum thepam nee..karai serven
En ullankayil veppam ne...

Heyy, en ullangilil minsarangal oduthe..
Maaligai pole veedugal katti,.....
Sanjalam konda kangalai moodi ...

Kanchana Mala, Kanchana Mala 
Kollamal kollum kanenna vela
Kanchana Mala ....

Vandhaan Vendraan Lyrics
Anjana Anjana by Aalaap Raju Nagaruthe Nagaruthe by Thaman SKanchana Mala by Karthilk, Priya HimeshThirandhen Thirendhen by Shreya Ghosal, Aalaap Raju
